data.text: To wo burodo gu nsuo ani,
Kyekyɛ mu ma nnipa baason, mpo nnipa baawɔtwe,
Sɛ omununkum mu wɔ nsuo a,
Obiara a ɔtwɛn ewiem nsakraeɛ no rennua,
Sɛdeɛ wonhunu ɛkwan a mframa nam soɔ,
Mfeɛ dodoɔ a onipa bɛtena nkwa yi mu nyinaa
Ma wʼani nnye, aberanteɛ, ɛberɛ a woyɛ ɔbabunu,
Enti yi adwendwene biara firi wʼakoma mu
